1.2.1.name: wordpress/postsummary
1.2.1.description:
visit plugin homepage

PostSummary allow you to add a widget with a kind of preview of your posts. You can add a list like the newspaper sites or a list of posts really similar to adsense style. You can mix your posts and adsense with the same aspect. Every instance of the widget is independent and can be configured separately. You can choose the categories to be displayed or if the lias is made of the most recent posts or, if you have statpresscn plugin, the most read posts.
